com.sri.ai.grinder.interpreter

Class TopRewriterUsingContextAssignments

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.rewriter.help.RedirectingRewriter
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.interpreter.TopRewriterUsingContextAssignments
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rewriter, BinaryFunction<Expression,Context,Expression>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TopRewriterUsingContextAssignmentsReceivingBaseTopRewriterAtConstruction

    public class TopRewriterUsingContextAssignments
extends RedirectingRewriter
    A TopRewriter based on another TopRewriter, and adding functionality for replacing expressions by their assignments stored on the context, stored there by AbstractIterativeMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator#extendAssignments(Map newAssignments, Context context).
    Author:
    braz
